snippet: The heroin, concealed inside 17,500 small grease cans packed into a large container sent from Karachi, was found Friday at a customs terminal in Sri Lanka’s capital.
lead_paragraph: The heroin, concealed inside 17,500 small grease cans packed into a large container sent from Karachi, was found Friday at a customs terminal in Sri Lanka’s capital.

headline.main: Sri Lankan Agents Seize 550 Pounds of Heroin
headline.print_headline: Sri Lankan Agents Seize 550 Pounds of Heroin
